channel.title: Linear Regression on Andy Cao
channel.description: Recent content in Linear Regression on Andy Cao

item.title: Project 1: Predict Real Estate Prices in Beijing
item.description: 1. Overview In this project, we will build a linear regression model to help people better understand the factors that can affect the price of a house in Beijing. The main sections of this article are: (1) Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA), (2) Developing Linear Regression model for predicting real estate price, and (3) Use that model to make predictions. The Python Notebook containing the complete model development process and the data used in this project can be found at Google Drive.
